meaning_str.bing:
adj. 多
adv. 大量
n. 多数人[东西]；大多数人；【女名】女子名
pron. 许多人[物]
网络. 许多的；很多；不少

多数人[东西]；大多数人；【女名】女子名

大多数人；多数人；群众；大众；民众；百姓

sogou-kaoyan.det/pron: 许多; 大多数人[出现120次)]

sogou-CET6.adj/adv: 大量的; 大多数的[出现115次)]

sogou-CET4.adj/adv: 大量的; 大多数的[出现291次)]

sogou-gaokao.det/pron/adj: 许多; 大多数人[出现99次)]

sogou-zhongkao.adj/adv/pron: 许多(的); 很多(的)[出现1322次)]

1.en: Fully aware of his serious illness, he made many courageous choices in the last few months in his life.
1.cn: 在完全了解自己严重病情的情况下，他在生命最后几个月里作出许多勇敢的选择。

2.en: There are many such stories and the point is always the same: Don't allow fear of failure to stop you.
2.cn: 这种例子不胜枚举，所要说明的道理只有一个：别让失败的恐惧停下你的脚步。

3.en: Group of Chinese harbour construction hangs out his shingle formally hold water already two years many.
3.cn: 中国港湾建设集团正式挂牌成立已经两年多了。

0.cn: 你们中的许多人也都共同面对着这些挑战。

1.en: They go by many names. Dave, Carl, Paul, Mike.
1.cn: 他们有许多个名字，戴夫，卡尔，保罗，迈克。

2.en: Because in many ways, manufacturing is the quintessential middle-class job.
2.cn: 在许多方面制造业是中产阶层最典型的工作。

3.en: Why are we stopping? For many, a near-miss with death is a wake-up call.
3.cn: 我们为什么停下？对许多人来说，濒死体验是一种警钟。

4.en: When too many cheap mortgages were being sold in 2007, a lot of people didn't know what was going on and a lot of others just followed the crowd.
4.cn: 当许多便宜的抵押品在2007年被贩卖时，有许多人都不知道怎么一回事，而只是跟着大多。数人的步调。

5.en: In one day, you've managed to do what it takes many couples decades to achieve.
5.cn: 你只用了短短一天就达到许多夫妻花了几十年才达到的境界。

6.en: The fish is an important animal symbol at Chinese New Year but there are many others.
6.cn: 鱼在中国新年里是一种重要的象征，但还有许多别的动物。

7.en: And it wasn't random. Many used a different specific color to attract insects.
7.cn: 花的颜色并非随机而来，许多花都会利用不同的颜色去吸引昆虫。

8.en: And, if their genetic code was pure, many of them would look quite different.
8.cn: 还有，如果她们的基因序列没有被改动，许多恐龙看上去会很不一样。

9.en: Right now, there are many wonderful opportunities and dangerous risks surrounding you that you don't see.
9.cn: 现在你的身边有许多看不见的绝好机会和危险的风险。

10.en: The world had been full of many different plant eaters including the vast balachetherium.
10.cn: 地球上曾出现过许多不同种类的草食动物，包括巨型俾路支兽。

11.en: Many Americans do not realize that the war in North Korea was entirely the fault of the United States.
11.cn: 许多美国人并没有明白，发生在朝鲜的战争完全是美国的错。

12.en: To give my future husband many sons, that is all I pray for. We shall talk much, Princess.
12.cn: 我只祈求，能为将来的夫君诞下许多子嗣。我们应该多聊聊，公主。

13.en: You see one of the many spectacular things my mutation allows me to do is that I can read your mind.
13.cn: 我的变异让我能做的许多了不起的事情之一是我能读懂你的想法。

14.en: But in many states, sending your kid to daycare costs more than sending them to a public university.
14.cn: 但在许多州，送你的孩子到托儿所的开支比送他们到公立大学还有多。

15.en: This is the principle of comparative advantage and it has persuaded many countries to sign up to free-trade agreements.
15.cn: 这就是比较优势原则，它也说服大家签订许多自由贸易协议。

16.en: You know, many soldiers would find this preferable to death, the opportunity to continue serving their country.
16.cn: 许多士兵都会认为执行这任务比死了要好，因为有机会继续为国家效力。

17.en: So Mr Drewe's accepted your offer. I'm so pleased. The Drewes have been at Yew Tree Farm for many years.
17.cn: 德鲁先生接受你们的提议喽。我太开心了，德鲁家在紫杉农场工作了许多年。

18.en: Now, many of our troops are returning from Afghanistan and on Monday, I'll be proud to help welcome them home.
18.cn: 现在，许多我们的军队正在从阿富汗归来，在周一，我很自豪能够欢迎他们回家。

19.en: Runway and James Holt share many things in common, chief among them, a commitment to excellence.
19.cn: 《天桥》与詹姆斯·浩特，有着许多的共同之处，最重要的是，都拥有对达到完美卓越的渴望。
